attributes.action: Hold an Enquiry into the treatment of British citizens in the hands of European football authorites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the government to investigate the treatment and the safety of British football fans travelling to European games. If something is not done about the way British fans are policed and stewarded both prior to and during these games I can envisage another major loss of life. We are heading towards another Heysel disaster.
